Reference:
Borchers B, Marrero S, Balco G, Caffee M, Goehring B, Lifton N, Nishiizumi K, Phillips F, Schaefer J, Stone J, 2016. Geological calibration of spallation production rates in the CRONUS-Earth project. Quaternary Geochronology 31, 188-198.

Data comments:
Sampling year based on sample names.
Group ID based on sample location and geomorphology. 07-NE- samples grouped with LIT samples in Balco et al. (2009). Repeat measurement of sample 09-DV-001-BCO present in Balco (2017).

expage.github.io - data from expage-201808
